My Expertise

I am an experienced Data Warehousing and React/Javascript engineer with strong programming skills in Python, C++ and R. Through my coursework I have further deepened my understanding of Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Statistics and Signal Processing. I am proficient in writing clean and organised code and a responsible team player. I have strong proficiency in working on multiple relational and analytical databases and writing complex SQL queries for data validation and provide quicker and accurate analytical solutions. I am self motivated, experienced in problem-solving and praised for showing an innate ability to pick up any new technology quickly.
